title: Integrated Information Literacy and Federated Search Skills Training for Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic experience in academic research and proficiency in digital tools
context.additional_context: Information literacy enhancement for professional learners (medical/legal/technical) in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can efficiently search academic resources across multiple databases using a federated search system.
Learners can apply information evaluation criteria to assess the reliability and validity of search results.
Learners can explain the process of developing research questions and establishing search strategies based on ACRL information literacy standards.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
